WeaponTraitList.Name: Ammunition Holder
WeaponTraitList.Description: Increases the maximum amount of carried ammunition for this weapon by 30%.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Backstabbery
WeaponTraitList.Description: Attacking enemies from the rear will deal extra damage.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Berserking
WeaponTraitList.Description: When killing an enemy with this weapon, there is a 5.0-12.0% chance to increase your attack speed by 30% for 5.0 seconds.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Bloodlust
WeaponTraitList.Description: When killing an enemy with this weapon, there is a 3-10% chance to recover 10% health.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Channeling Rune
WeaponTraitList.Description: Reduce the damage you take from venting this weapon by x%.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Devastating Blow
WeaponTraitList.Description: Pushes made with this weapon will be extra powerful.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Diversion
WeaponTraitList.Description: Attacking an enemy that is attacking a Knocked Down ally, will extend the ally's Knocked Down health.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Earthing rune
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy with a normal attack, there is x-x% chance to vent x% of your overcharge.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Endurance
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy there is x-x% chance that the player replenishes stamina.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Extra Capacity
WeaponTraitList.Description: Increases the amount of ammunition this weapon can hold in a clip by 100%.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Hail of Doom
WeaponTraitList.Description: Each shot with this weapon has a 5-15% chance to split into 2 projectiles.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Haste
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy, there is a 3.0-7.0% chance to increase your attack speed by 30%, for 5 seconds.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Hawk Eye
WeaponTraitList.Description: Increases the zoom distance while aiming with this weapon.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Heroic Killing Blow (Charged Attack)
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy of any size with a charged attack there is a 1.0-3.0% chance to instantly slay it.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Improved Guard
WeaponTraitList.Description: When blocking an enemy with this weapon, there is 10-30% chance that the block won't cost any stamina.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Improved Pommel
WeaponTraitList.Description: When pushing with this weapon, there is a x-x% chance that the push won't cost any stamina.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Inspirational Shot
WeaponTraitList.Description: Scoring headshots will replenish the stamina of your allies.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Killing Blow
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting a man-sized enemy with a normal attack there is a 5.0-15.0% chance to instantly slay it.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Knockback
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy, there is a 5-10% chance to knock them back.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Master Crafted
WeaponTraitList.Description: Reloading this weapon is 50,0% faster.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Off Balance
WeaponTraitList.Description: Enemies whose attacks are blocked by the player will suffer extra damage from your alliesâ€™ attacks for a brief moment.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Perfect Balance
WeaponTraitList.Description: Adds 2 Stamina (1 Shield) to the weapon's max Stamina Points.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Regrowth (Normal Attack)
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy with a normal attack, there is a 3-10% chance to recover 5% health.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Regrowth (Charged Attack)
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy with a charged attack, there is a 3-10% chance to recover 5% health.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Rupture
WeaponTraitList.Description: Projectiles from this weapon have a 80-100% chanse of penetrating one additional target.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Safety in Numbers
WeaponTraitList.Description: Assisting an ally (by attacking enemies attacking the ally) will apply a temporary protective aura to said ally.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Scavenger
WeaponTraitList.Description: When killing an enemy with this weapon, there is a 5-12% chance to replenish ammunition for your ranged weapon.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Second Wind
WeaponTraitList.Description: 30.0-50.0% chance to instantly replenish all stamina if the player's block is broken.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Skirmisher
WeaponTraitList.Description: Movement speed while aiming with this weapon is increased by 50%.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Skull Cracker
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy, there is x-x% chance that it will count as an automatic headshot, regardless of where it hit.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Stability
WeaponTraitList.Description: Overcharge generated by this weapon is reduced by x%.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Swift Slaying (Normal Attack)
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy with a normal attack, there is x-x% chance to increase your attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Swift Slaying (Charged Attack)
WeaponTraitList.Description: When hitting an enemy with a charged attack, there is x-x% chance to increase your attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

WeaponTraitList.Name: Targeteer
WeaponTraitList.Description: Decreases the spread of this weapon by 40%.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Brigandine
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you will take less damage from the warpdust covered blades of Gutter Runners.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Bullet Resistant
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you will take 20%/x%/x% less damage from the warp bullets of Ratling Gunners.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Coagulation
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, your health is increased while knocked down.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Curse Ward
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you are allegedly protected against curses.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Explosive Ordnance
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, the effective radius of all grenades you throw is increased by 50.0%.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Gleaming Luckstone
TrinketTraitList.Description: You will get extra Luck.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Grenadier
TrinketTraitList.Description: When throwing a Granade there is a 20.0% chance that it won's be consumed.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Group Treatment
TrinketTraitList.Description: When using Medical Supplies & Healing Draughts on yourself, allies within 15.0 meters will be healed for 10.0%/x%/x% of their missing health.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Hand of Shallya
TrinketTraitList.Description: When using Medical Supplies on an ally, you will be healed for x%/15.0%/x% of your missing health.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Healer's Touch
TrinketTraitList.Description: When using Medical Supplies there is a chance that it won't be consumed.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Healing Charm
TrinketTraitList.Description: Group Treatment: When using Medical Supplies, allies within 15.0 meters will be healed for X% for your total heal.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Home Brewer
TrinketTraitList.Description: When drinking a Potion of Speed or Strength there is a 10.0%/20.0%/x% chance that it will not be consumed.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Iron Lung
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you will take less damage from Poison Wind Globadier clouds.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Morr's Crown
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, your attacks have a 2.0%/4.0%/x% chance to apply a deadly poison.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Proxy
TrinketTraitList.Description: When drinking a Potion of Speed or Strength, the effect will spread to all allies within 15.0 meters, but the duration is decreased by 33.0%.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Ranald's Blessing
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, your luck is increased by 10.0%/x%/100%.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Seal of Runner
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, your movement speed is increased by 2.0%.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Sister of Shallya
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you can no longer be interrupted while using Medical Supplies.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Star of the Sisterhood
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you share a common health pool with all other wearers of this trinket.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Triage
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you will revive allies faster.

TrinketTraitList.Name: Veteran Surgeon
TrinketTraitList.Description: While equipped, you can no longer be interrupted while reviving an ally.
